title: Mae Sot
description: May be known as Yota and Youta. Small, Thai-Burmese restaurant in downtown Mae Sot. Food is Mahayana-Buddhist vegan though owners are not. Offers changing daily dishes which are on display and ready for take-away, or order from the menu. Menu is in Thai and Burmese. Has 6 tables for seating. Get there early for specialty options before they are sold out. Directions: coming from Prasatwiti Road, turn left onto Siriphanit Road, and it's the 2nd soi on the left, 50 meters down.
